articles.author: The Guardian
articles.title: Win for Maine as Trump officials agree to halt school funding freeze
articles.description: USDA had suspended funds for child nutrition program after state said it would not bar trans girls from girls’ sports
articles.content:
The Trump administration has agreed not to freeze funds to Maine schools, a win for a state that was targeted by the president over its support of transgender rights.

articles.title: CIA and other spy agencies to shrink workforce under Trump administration plans
articles.description: The White House plans to reduce the workforce by 1,200 over several years and cut thousands of positions at other intelligence agencies
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump's fixation on wrongly deported man's tattoos nothing but a distraction, says lawyer
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump is trying to paint Kilmar Abrego Garcia as a criminal with gang tattoos and a history of violence. But his lawyer says the administration is just trying to distract from the fact that it deported him by mistake, and is flouting court orders to bring him back.
articles.content:
As It Happens 6:24 Trump's fixation on wrongly deported man's tattoos nothing but a distraction, says lawyer
It doesn't matter what kind of tattoos Kilmar Abrego Garcia has, says his lawyer.
